version.name: 1.48b
version.author: Joep Vanlier

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Fix for RMS detection Additional filter to chain (note that you may have to turn this off in some of your presets if you've been using the FIR filter)! Added optional input/output clipping Added RMS mode for dynamics Bugfix modulation Added 5 more filters Added wasp filter Initialize spline immediately to avoid flicker Extra optimization wasp Fixed bug in MIDI LFO reset Bugfix diode ladder (now stable) Added pregain automation Improved kr0g filters Hotfix LFO Add minimum oversampling for filters that need it More rigorous buffer clearing Fix for LFO (disabled when turned off) Included presets Added cutoff/reso interpolation Bugfix filter selection Fix rms clipping behavior Added attack and decay multiplier options Fixed threshold going out of bounds Enhanced stability saike's waveshaped filters (feedback clipper) Added usage hints Added FM filters and sine wave distortion Improved some hint descriptions Improved usability (bigger sliders Widened combobox Removed secondary slider range for sliders which do not support it Attempted to automate retina support Fix issue with RMS acquiring DC and not losing it Added FIR option for up/downsampling Added option to change modulation amount Added scaling for non windows machines Fix thresh jitter Fix pdc_delay Added logo Fixed mouse wheel behaviour Fontsize fix for mac (hopefully) Minor tweaks Added retina scaling Huge refactor of the codebase Fixed update bug Potatoes Aadded filter frequency in Hz where sensible Display modulation range (to avoid confusion) Added a few comb filters Added keyboard handling Fixed minor issues Fixed incorrect spline loading behavior Made default tooltip wait time a bit longer and added a toggle to turn them off (T key) Bugfix refreshing of dynamic mode labels Added visualization of dynamics of the shaper when activated to make this more clear Major bugfix extrapolation Fixed issue with filters modes leaking output to eachother when switching Increase scale when double clicking logo Made gui sizing / hide persistent Perf improvements wasp

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Hotfix for gain issue before UI is opened

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Made sure that change parameter actually reflects what's being changed in case of sliders with 'dynamics' slider

version.changelog: Forgot to hide slider again X_X

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added a few more ms-20 models (better saturation model) Derivative fix ms-20

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: let me know Modified "expensive" moog quite a bit to make it more stable Shrunk cutoff range 'expensive moog' Attempt to stabilize waveshaped filters Sorry about the changes Handwavily optimized BP version of WASP Fixed bad scaling issue in the SSM filter and new Kr0g versions If anyone needs the old one back

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Force refresh when filter changed Stabilized Phaser 1

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added velocity sensitive MIDI mode

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added inverse link for input/output gain Fixed issue with modulation not resetting at proper points when using lookahead feature

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Optimized cem Added a few afterimage lines to the plot Added ability to activate dynamics and lfo for specific filters separately

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Display cutoff (when available for that filter) on second filter as well Properly initialize reso Move spline memory to location where it is less likely to get clobbered if there is an initialization issue Make sure that nodes actually have to be clicked to be selected Removed no_denorm to hopefully prevent CPU spikes Bugfix combobox Added dbl rightcl ick for setting dynamic variable to zero midi and cutoff memory Increase size tooltips

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Bugfix LFO random Bugfix hold mechanism MIDI2

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Add ability to automate post gain Add ability to toggle DYN / LFO for them

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Minor bugfix for very fast attacks in the dynamics Optional keyfollow

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to set keyfollow amount. + Use C-2 as note base for keyfollow rather than A-4.

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to link filters in parallel.

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added control over distortion mode second filter.

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Better tooltip for second filtermode. + Added randomize button (SHIFT + R)

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Limit crybaby range.

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Display stereofield + Rename Stereoize more appropriately to Stereo Boost + Add actual stereoize filter mode (Haas effect)

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added option to copy spline function over to other side. + Threshold = 1 default. + Fix bug not resetting random appropriately on init. + Smoothened goniometer dots a little bit. + Implemented more sensible minimum for all filters. + Added option to bypass filter. + Added shortcut SHIFT+S (swap filters). + Added shortcut SHIFT+F (randomize filters). + Added shortcut SHIFT+W (randomize waveshaper). + Added shortcut SHIFT+L (randomize LFO). + Fixed issue with vowel filter not resetting properly. + Fixed issue with experimental filter not resetting properly. + Added second vowel filter (more stable this one). + Added monstro filter. + Added subtle stereo mode. + Add smoothing for the spectrum. + Exposed colors in init section. + Fixed issue with spline end point jumping around

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Allow dragging noise floor FFT + Allow changing zoom on goniometer with dragging + Allow setting smoothing factor with scrollwheel

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added King of Tone pedal. + Added proper minimum for waspey linear and pwm potato filters. + Added default for the spline y at 1.0. + Remove safety from narsty. + Improve antialiasing goniometer. + Mirror goniometer over XY to be compatible with other goniometers. + Increase line thickness waveshaper. + Allow waveshaper nodes to be grabbed by digits. + Split filters out over four columns to not exceed plugin size limits. + Allow last focused combobox to be manipulated with mousewheel. + Fix spline issue when extrapolating to extreme values (clamp last derivative to max/min) + Change waveshaper selection to combobox + Added MIDI compatibility for keyboards that send a note on with velocity zero as note off. + Added modulon filter.

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added 2 measure length

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Prevent spline being pulled out of window when dragging by the numbers

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Emit preset to automation recording (SHIFT + P)

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Added automatic gain compensation (AGC)

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Tweaks in Automatic Gain Compensation (AGC)

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Outer mouse on AGC transfers value to post-gain.

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: + Store last agc value to not get bursts

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: but merely add/remove channels Added "OFF" option for sonogram/time window Added solo (doubleclick on a channel) Added transparency setting Only add top level channels to avoid adding channels multiple times Do not recreate spectrum track when it already exists
